alert.note: Alert for Oconto (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 1:28PM CDT until October 24 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL OCONTO COUNTY... At 128 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southeast of Bear Paw Scout Camp, or 24 miles northeast of Shawano, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Spruce, Breed, Lena, Suring, Hickory Corners, White Potato Lake, Hayes, and Klondike. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
